title: Biodiversity may decrease due to human activity

content.prompt: If the pond is resampled a year later, which of the following would best indicate that the pond had been adversely affected by adjacent development?

choices.label: An uncommon species has become more numerous.
An increase in low-tolerance species has occurred.
A decrease in high-tolerance species has occurred.
The biodiversity of the pond has decreased.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
